video.title: Marvel's Daredevil
video.synopsis: Blinded as a young boy, Matt Murdock fights injustice by day as a lawyer and by night as the Super Hero Daredevil in Hell's Kitchen, New York City.

episodes.synopsis: Murdock's vigilante crime fighting and his new law practice find equally dangerous challenges in a murder case tied to a corporate crime syndicate.
episodes.title: Into the Ring

episodes.synopsis: Murdock makes a near fatal error while trying to save a kidnapped boy, and finds an unlikely ally when he needs saving himself.
episodes.title: Cut Man

episodes.synopsis: Murdock and Foggy take on a mysterious wealthy client, but Murdock is convinced that there's more to the case than just the facts.
episodes.title: Rabbit in a Snowstorm

episodes.synopsis: Two vicious Russian brothers working for Fisk strike back against Daredevil. Fisk moves to further consolidate his power in the criminal underworld.
episodes.title: In the Blood

episodes.synopsis: Fisk moves forward with plans that threaten to rip Hell's Kitchen apart. Murdock and Foggy take on a case helping tenants victimized by a slumlord.
episodes.title: World On Fire

episodes.synopsis: Daredevil finds himself trapped in the fallout of Fisk's plan to take control of Hell's Kitchen. Ben Urich digs closer to the truth.
episodes.title: Condemned

episodes.synopsis: An important figure from Murdock's past reemerges seeking his help to battle a new enemy threatening Hell's Kitchen.
episodes.title: Stick

episodes.synopsis: While Murdock, Foggy and Karen's mission becomes clearer, Fisk's world spins further out of control in his battle for Hell's Kitchen.
episodes.title: Shadows in the Glass

episodes.synopsis: When Fisk gains the upper hand, the goal to destroy him becomes even more difficult, while Daredevil faces his own demons.
episodes.title: Speak of the Devil

episodes.synopsis: Murdock and Foggy's relationship is put to the ultimate test while a new enemy against Fisk emerges.
episodes.title: Nelson v. Murdock

episodes.synopsis: Fisk and Murdock wrestle with the consequences of their chosen paths, while Ben and Karen get closer to Fisk's true past.
episodes.title: The Path of the Righteous

episodes.synopsis: Fisk seeks revenge while Karen is haunted by recent events. Daredevil makes a startling discovery about Fisk's financing.
episodes.title: The Ones We Leave Behind

episodes.synopsis: In the season finale, a boxed-in Fisk and a desperate Murdock, Foggy and Karen are forced to play their end games.
episodes.title: Daredevil
